articles.title: Russia's four-year ban from all international sport over doping failures UPHELD by CAS - Daily Mail
articles.description: Russia are set to be allowed to play at the next World Cup as a 'neutral' team wearing a red kit and carrying the country's name on their shirts - despite being banned.
articles.content:
Russia are set to be allowed to play at the next World Cup as a neutral team wearing a red kit and carrying the countrys name on their shirts despite being banned.
